description: The new deal, which will see Isle of Man customers receive a rebate this year, is backed by Tynwald.
title: New regulation proposals for Manx Gas approved by Tynwald
title_page: New regulation proposals for Manx Gas approved by Tynwald - BBC News
maintext: The deal will see the firm separated into two parts - a regulated part for households and businesses using less than 12,000KW a year and an unregulated part for those with a larger usage.
